name: Escape from an abandoned house
description:
*Please kindly note that I'm not good at English.

Guide a boy(named Graphy)  and let him escape from an abandoned house!

(His story is in process. Please follow my Twitter not to miss new information!)

This game was once submitted to Unityroom in order to join Unity1week. Japanese version is there.
